## Gene Details:
- **MSU gene ID:** [LOC_Os05g06270](http://rice.uga.edu/cgi-bin/ORF_infopage.cgi?orf=LOC_Os05g06270)  
- **RAPdb gene ID:** [Os05g0154600](https://rapdb.dna.affrc.go.jp/locus/?name=Os05g0154600)  
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>APIP6</u>
- **Genome:**  [MSU7](http://rice.uga.edu/),&nbsp;&nbsp;[IRGSP-1.0](https://rapdb.dna.affrc.go.jp/download/irgsp1.html)
- **Species:** *Oryza sativa*

## Functional Descriptions:
   - Silencing of **APIP6** in transgenic rice leads to a significant reduction of flg22-induced ROS generation, suppression of defense-related gene expression, and enhanced susceptibility of rice plants to M.
   - The Magnaporthe oryzae effector AvrPiz-t targets the RING E3 ubiquitin ligase **APIP6** to suppress pathogen-associated molecular pattern-triggered immunity in rice.

## Function-related keywords:
   - [defense](/tags/defense/),&nbsp;&nbsp;[magnaporthe-oryzae](/tags/magnaporthe-oryzae/)

## Literature:
   - [The Magnaporthe oryzae effector AvrPiz-t targets the RING E3 ubiquitin ligase APIP6 to suppress pathogen-associated molecular pattern-triggered immunity in rice](https://www.doi.org/10.1105/tpc.112.105429).&nbsp;&nbsp;DOI:&nbsp;&nbsp;[10.1105/tpc.112.105429](https://www.doi.org/10.1105/tpc.112.105429);&nbsp;&nbsp;PMID:&nbsp;&nbsp;[23204406](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/23204406/)
